channel.title: Uke Along Artist » The Beach Boys

item.title: The Beach Boys - I Can Hear Music - Key of D
item.description:
Ukulele play along
I Can Hear Music - The Beach Boys
Using the chords: A A7 D D7 Em F#m G Gm
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU or DU DU DU DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Beach Boys - In My Room - Key of C
item.description:
For educational use.
Chords Used: C Bb Am Dm G G7
In My Room by The Beach Boys. It’s been raised by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along. The chords have been added to a lyric video that was created by YouTuber rainbow4121 which may be found here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-b5WsEDZvsE.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: The Beach Boys - Little Saint Nick - Baritone Ukulele
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE ukulele. Key of G. Raised a half step from the original.
As performed by the Beach Boys.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Baritone Ukulele, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.

item.description:

item.title: The Beach Boys - Good Vibrations - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G (well, it ends in G)
As performed by The Beach Boys.
Here’s a chance to practice Bb and E.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
Check out the Ukulele Video Play Along Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Apple Podcasts and Google Play.

item.title: The Beach Boys - Surfin' U.S.A. - Key of C
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Surfin' USA - The Beach Boys
This is one of the first songs we learn and the ukuleles in the video match the colour of the chords we use (Rainbow method).
We have been using the original version of this video by Dr Jill Reese which has really helped us, it's just been tweaked a little to match our chord colours.
In the Key Of C Maj
Using the chords: C F G7
Suggested Strum Patterns: D D D D or D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: The Beach Boys - Barbara Ann - Key of G
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of G. Original is in the key of F# or Gb, so this version is raised a half step.
As performed by The Beach Boys.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
The colored font matches Aquila KIDS and DR Multi-Color ukulele strings.
Are these ukulele resources valuable to you? If so, consider following my blog at ukestuff.info, and becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/cjrphd. There is a master list of all similar play along videos at ukestuff.info.
